education.studyType: Bachelor Of Computer Science And Applications.

work.description: - Engineered and launched six responsive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript within a four-month internship period; enhanced user experience by optimizing load times to achieve an average of 3 seconds per page.

- Conducted data analysis and developed predictive models using Python and machine learning techniques, improving forecasting accuracy by 20%.
- Prepared detailed reports and visualizations, enabling data-driven business decisions that increased operational efficiency by 15%

projects.name: Road Lane Line Detection
projects.description:
- Developed a Python-based system to detect road lane lines using OpenCV.
- Built a Python-based lane detection system using OpenCV, reducing processing time for real-time video feeds by 30% and increasing detection accuracy by 20%, enhancing navigation reliability in autonomous vehicles.
keywords: Python, OpenCV, NumPy, Matplotlib, Canny Edge Detection, Hough Transform

projects.name: E-commerce Website
projects.description:
- Built an e-commerce website prototype using ReactJS and Firebase.
- Developed an e-commerce platform prototype using ReactJS and Firebase, enabling real-time product updates and reducing page load time by 40%.
- Implemented secure payment integration with Stripe API, ensuring 99.9% transaction success rate and improving user experience for over 500 simulated transactions.
keywords: ReactJS, Firebase (Firestore, Authentication), JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Stripe API (for payment integration).

projects.name: Customer Segmentation Analysis
projects.description:
- Analyzed customer data using clustering techniques to identify distinct segments.
- Analyzed customer data of over 10,000 users using K-Means and hierarchical clustering, identifying 5 distinct segments that improved targeted marketing campaigns, resulting in a 25% increase in customer engagement.
keywords: Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Jupyter Notebook
